      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info("Calling API: #{payroll.class} (pay items) ...")
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            

            
              
            

                pay_items = []
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            

            
              
            

                if payroll.is_a?(XeroRuby::PayrollAuApi)
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            

            
              
            

                  headers = { "Authorization" => "Bearer #{XeroConnection.first.access_token}", "Xero-Tenant-Id" => xero_tenant_id, "Accept" => "application/json" }
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            

            
              
            

                  raw = HTTParty.get("https://api.xero.com/payroll.xro/1.0/PayItems", headers: headers)
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("Raw AU PayItems status=#{raw.code}, bytes=#{raw.body.to_s.bytesize}")
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            

            
              
            

                  parsed = nil
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            

            
              
            

                  if raw.code == 200 && raw.body.present?
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            

            
              
            

                      parsed = JSON.parse(raw.body)
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.warn("Raw AU PayItems response was not valid JSON")
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            

            
              
            

                  if parsed
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            

            
              
            

                    container = parsed["PayItems"] || parsed["payItems"] || {}
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            

            
              
            

                    earnings  = container["EarningsRates"] || container["earningsRates"] || []
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            

            
              
            

                    if earnings.is_a?(Array) && earnings.any?
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            

            
              
            

                      pay_items = earnings.map do |er|
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            

            
              
            

                        { id: er["EarningsRateID"] || er["earningsRateID"] || er["EarningsRateId"] || er["earningsRateId"], name: er["Name"] || er["name"] }
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            

            
              
            

                  if pay_items.empty?
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            

            
              
            

                    raw2 = HTTParty.get("https://api.xero.com/payroll.xro/1.0/EarningsRates", headers: headers)
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("Raw AU EarningsRates status=#{raw2.code}, bytes=#{raw2.body.to_s.bytesize}")
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            

            
              
            

                    if raw2.code == 200 && raw2.body.present?
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            

            
              
            

                        parsed2 = JSON.parse(raw2.body)
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            

            
              
            

                        list = parsed2["EarningsRates"] || parsed2["earningsRates"] || []
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            

            
              
            

                        if list.is_a?(Array)
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            

            
              
            

                          pay_items = list.map { |er| { id: er["EarningsRateID"] || er["earningsRateID"], name: er["Name"] || er["name"] } }
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn("Raw AU EarningsRates response was not valid JSON")
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            

            
              
            

                    settings = payroll.get_settings(xero_tenant_id)
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            

            
              
            

                    container = settings.settings&.pay_items
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            

            
              
            

                    earnings  = container&.earnings_rates || []
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            

            
              
            

                    pay_items = earnings.map { |er| { id: er.earnings_rate_id, name: er.name } }
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            

            
              
            

                    if e.code == 204
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            

            
              
            

                      pay_items = []
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            

            
              
            

                      raise
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info("Pay items fetched: count=#{pay_items.size}")
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            

            
              
            

                if pay_items.any?
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            

            
              
            

                  pay_items.each do |er|
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            

            
              
            

                    next if er[:id].blank?
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            

            
              
            

                    ShiftType.find_or_initialize_by(xero_earnings_rate_id: er[:id]).update(name: er[:name].presence || "(Unnamed earnings rate)")
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, notice: "Successfully synced #{pay_items.count} pay items."
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, notice: "Sync complete. No pay items found."
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            

            
              
            

                msg = case e.code
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            

            
              
            

                when 401 then "Error syncing pay items: 401 Unauthorized. Please reconnect."
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            

            
              
            

                when 404 then "Error syncing pay items: 404 Not Found. Likely wrong payroll region for this tenant or payroll not provisioned."
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            

            
              
            

                else "Error syncing pay items: #{e.code} #{e.message}"
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, alert: msg
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            

            
              
            

              def sync_invoice_items
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            

            
              
            

                client = xero_api_client
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless client
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            

            
              
            

                connection = XeroConnection.first
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            

            
              
            

                unless connection
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, alert: "No Xero connection found. Please connect first." and return
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            

            
              
            

                tenant_id  = connection.tenant_id
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            

            
              
            

                accounting = XeroRuby::AccountingApi.new(client)
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            

            
              
            

                created = 0
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            

            
              
            

                updated = 0
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            

            
              
            

                page    = 1
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            

            
              
            

                  loop do
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Calling API: AccountingApi.get_items page=#{page} ..."
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            

            
              
            

                    resp = accounting.get_items(tenant_id, { page: page })
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Normalize response to an array of item objects/hashes
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            

            
              
            

                    batch =
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            

            
              
            

                      if resp.respond_to?(:items)
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            

            
              
            

                        Array(resp.items)
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            

            
              
            

                      elsif resp.is_a?(Hash)
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            

            
              
            

                        Array(resp["Items"] || resp["items"])
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            

            
              
            

                        []
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            

            
              
            

                    break if batch.blank?
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            

            
              
            

                    batch.each do |it|
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Extract fields defensively for SDK objects or hashes
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            

            
              
            

                      xero_item_id = it.respond_to?(:item_id) ? it.item_id : (it["ItemID"] || it["ItemId"] || it["itemId"])
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            

            
              
            

                      code         = it.respond_to?(:code)    ? it.code    : (it["Code"]   || it["code"])
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            

            
              
            

                      name         = it.respond_to?(:name)    ? it.name    : (it["Name"]   || it["name"])
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            

            
              
            

                      description  = it.respond_to?(:description) ? it.description : (it["Description"] || it["description"])
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            

            
              
            

                      is_sold      = it.respond_to?(:is_sold) ? it.is_sold : it["IsSold"] || it["isSold"]
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            

            
              
            

                      is_tracked   = it.respond_to?(:is_tracked_as_inventory) ? it.is_tracked_as_inventory : (it["IsTrackedAsInventory"] || it["isTrackedAsInventory"])
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Prefer unique match on xero_item_id if we have it, otherwise fall back to code
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            

            
              
            

                      rec =
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            

            
              
            

                        if xero_item_id.present? && XeroItem.column_names.include?("xero_item_id")
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            

            
              
            

                          XeroItem.find_or_initialize_by(xero_item_id: xero_item_id)
          
      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            

            
              
            

                          # last resort: use code as identifier
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            

            
              
            

                          identifier = code.presence || name # avoid totally blank keys
          
      669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    669. 
            

            
              
            

                          next if identifier.blank?
          
      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            

            
              
            

                          XeroItem.find_or_initialize_by(code: identifier)
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    673. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Assign attributes and count created/updated
          
      674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    674. 
            

            
              
            

                      was_new = rec.new_record?
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            

            
              
            

                      rec.code        = code        if code.present?
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            

            
              
            

                      rec.name        = name        if name.present?
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            

            
              
            

                      rec.description = description if rec.respond_to?(:description)
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            

            
              
            

                      rec.is_sold     = is_sold     if rec.respond_to?(:is_sold)
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            

            
              
            

                      if rec.respond_to?(:is_tracked_as_inventory)
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            

            
              
            

                        rec.is_tracked_as_inventory = is_tracked
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            

            
              
            

                      # If we matched by code but model has xero_item_id column, set it
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            

            
              
            

                      if xero_item_id.present? && rec.respond_to?(:xero_item_id) && rec.xero_item_id.blank?
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            

            
              
            

                        rec.xero_item_id = xero_item_id
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            
              
            

                      if rec.changed?
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            
              
            

                        rec.save!
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            
              
            

                        was_new ? created += 1 : updated += 1
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            
              
            

                    # stop when the returned page is smaller than the typical page size
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            
              
            

                    break if batch.size < 100
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            
              
            

                    page += 1
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            
              
            

                  if created.zero? && updated.zero?
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            
              
            

                    flash[:alert] = "Sync finished but no invoice items were returned from Xero."
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            
              
            

                    flash[:notice] = "Synced Xero invoice items: #{created} created, #{updated} updated."
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            
              
            

                  code    = (e.respond_to?(:code) ? e.code : nil)
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            
              
            

                  headers = (e.respond_to?(:response_headers) ? e.response_headers : {}) || {}
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            
              
            

                  corr    = headers["xero-correlation-id"] || headers["Xero-Correlation-Id"]
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            
              
            

                  msg =
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            
              
            

                    case code
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            
              
            

                    when 401 then "Error syncing invoice items: 401 Unauthorized. Please reconnect."
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            
              
            

                    when 403 then "Error syncing invoice items: 403 Forbidden. Check Xero scopes for items (accounting.settings.read)."
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            
              
            

                    when 404 then "Error syncing invoice items: 404 Not Found."
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            
              
            

                    else          "Error syncing invoice items: #{code} #{e.message}"
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, alert: [ msg, (corr ? "Corr: #{corr}" : nil) ].compact.join(" ")
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      723.

              # Parse a date string or return nil

              def parse_date(str)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                Date.parse(str) rescue nil
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      12.

              def new
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                # Dates (defaults to Wed–Tue week like your logs show)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                @start_date = params[:start_date].present? ? Date.parse(params[:start_date]) : Date.today.beginning_of_week(:wednesday)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                @end_date   = params[:end_date].present?   ? Date.parse(params[:end_date])   : (@start_date + 6.days)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                tz   = ActiveSupport::TimeZone["Australia/Brisbane"]
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                from = tz.parse(@start_date.to_s).beginning_of_day
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                to   = tz.parse(@end_date.to_s).end_of_day
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                # EXACTLY the same scope your logs show (approved + area present)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                @approved_timesheets = Timesheet
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  .where(status: 1) # approved
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  .where(clock_in_at: from..to)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  .joins(:shift)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  .where.not(shifts: { area_id: nil })
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  .includes(shift: [ :location, :area, :user ])
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  .order("shifts.start_time ASC")
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # If the rest of your controller uses another var, make it point to the same list
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheets ||= @approved_timesheets
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                # Parse dates (used only to select timesheets and to round-trip back to the page)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                start_date = (Date.parse(params[:start_date]) rescue nil) || Date.today.beginning_of_week(:wednesday)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                end_date   = (Date.parse(params[:end_date])   rescue nil) || (start_date + 6.days)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                tz   = ActiveSupport::TimeZone["Australia/Brisbane"]
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                from = tz.parse(start_date.to_s).beginning_of_day
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                to   = tz.parse(end_date.to_s).end_of_day
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                range = from..to
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                selected_ids = Array(params[:timesheet_ids]).reject(&:blank?).map(&:to_i)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                timesheets =
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  if selected_ids.present?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[XeroInvoiceExports] Using #{selected_ids.size} explicitly selected timesheets")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    Timesheet.includes(shift: [ :location, :area, :user ]).where(id: selected_ids)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[XeroInvoiceExports] No timesheet_ids selected; using all eligible timesheets in range #{start_date}..#{end_date}")
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    Timesheet
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(status: 1) # approved
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(clock_in_at: range)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                      .joins(:shift)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where.not(shifts: { area_id: nil })
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      .includes(shift: [ :location, :area, :user ])
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                      .order("shifts.start_time ASC")
          
      60.

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61.

                if timesheets.blank?

                  redirect_to new_admin_xero_invoice_export_path(start_date: start_date, end_date: end_date),

                  return
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                # NOTE: InvoiceExport does NOT have start_date/end_date columns.
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                export = InvoiceExport.create!(
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "queued",
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  idempotency_key: SecureRandom.uuid,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_count: timesheets.size
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build one InvoiceExportLine per timesheet (keeps your existing “hours worked” behaviour intact).
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                timesheets.find_each do |ts|
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  shift    = ts.shift
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  location = shift&.location
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  area     = shift&.area
          
      80.

                  next if area.nil? || location.nil?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  work_day = (ts.clock_in_at || ts.created_at).in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  hours    = (ts.duration.to_f / 3600.0).round(2)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  rate     = ts.respond_to?(:cost) ? ts.cost : nil
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  employee = shift.user&.name
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  # New description format: "One Staff on DATE from TIME - TIME"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  if ts.clock_in_at && ts.clock_out_at
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89.

    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                    desc = "One Staff on #{work_day.strftime('%d %^b %Y')} (incomplete times)"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  InvoiceExportLine.create!(
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                    invoice_export: export,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                    location: location,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                    area: area,

    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    timesheet: ts,

    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    description: desc
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                # Run the export job now; it will add the Travel line items (separate line with quantity = ts.travel)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                Xero::InvoiceExportJob.perform_now(export)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to new_admin_xero_invoice_export_path(start_date: start_date, end_date: end_date),
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                            notice: "Exported #{export.invoice_export_lines.count} line(s) to Xero."
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_xero_api_client
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                connection = XeroConnection.first
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                unless connection
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, alert: "You must be connected to Xero to export invoices."
          
      116.

                  return
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info("[XeroInvoiceExports] Pre-refresh token_expires_at=#{connection.expires_at&.iso8601} tenant_id=#{connection.tenant_id || 'nil'}")
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                if connection.expires_at && connection.expires_at <= Time.current + 5.minutes
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  refreshed = refresh_token(connection)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless refreshed
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn("[XeroInvoiceExports] Token refresh failed; halting request")
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  connection.reload
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroInvoiceExports] Post-refresh token_expires_at=#{connection.expires_at&.iso8601}")
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                XeroRuby.configure { |c| c.access_token = connection.access_token }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                @xero_client = XeroRuby::ApiClient.new
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                @accounting_api = XeroRuby::AccountingApi.new(@xero_client)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              def refresh_token(connection)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                client_id     = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:xero, :client_id)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                client_secret = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:xero, :client_secret)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                unless client_id.present? && client_secret.present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("[XeroInvoiceExports] Missing Xero OAuth credentials; cannot refresh token")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, alert: "Missing Xero OAuth credentials. Please reconnect."
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  return false
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                response = HTTParty.post(
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  "https://identity.xero.com/connect/token",
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  headers: { "Content-Type" => "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  body:    { grant_type: "refresh_token", refresh_token: connection.refresh_token },
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  basic_auth: { username: client_id, password: client_secret }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                if response.success?
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  data = response.parsed_response
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  connection.update!(
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    access_token:  data["access_token"],
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    refresh_token: data["refresh_token"] || connection.refresh_token,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    expires_at:    Time.current + data["expires_in"].to_i.seconds
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroInvoiceExports] Token refreshed successfully; new expiry=#{connection.expires_at&.iso8601}")
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  true
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("[XeroInvoiceExports] Token refresh failed status=#{response.code} body=#{response.body}")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path, alert: "Failed to refresh Xero token (#{response.code}). Please try reconnecting."
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  false
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      169.

            class Admin::XeroItemMappingsController < ApplicationController
          
      3.

              before_action :set_connection

              def show
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @areas = Area.includes(:location).order(:name)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @items = fetch_items # [{code:, name:}, ...] from local cache table
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9.

              def update
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # params: { mappings: { "<area_id>" => "<xero_item_code>", ... } }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                (params[:mappings] || {}).each do |area_id, code|

    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  Area.where(id: area_id).update_all(xero_item_code: code.presence)

    17.

    18. 
            

            
              
            

              def sync
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Force pull from Xero and upsert into local cache table
          
      20.

                synced_count = sync_items_from_xero

    21.

              end

              private
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26.

              def set_connection
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                @connection = XeroConnection.first or raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              # Return items for the view from local cache unless forcing a refresh
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_items(force: false)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                if force
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  sync_items_from_xero
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                XeroItem.order(:code).pluck(:code, :name).map { |code, name| { code: code, name: name } }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

              def sync_items_from_xero
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                XeroRuby.configure { |c| c.access_token = @connection.access_token }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                api_client     = XeroRuby::ApiClient.new
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                accounting_api = XeroRuby::AccountingApi.new(api_client)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                resp = accounting_api.get_items(@connection.tenant_id)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                items = Array(resp.items)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                XeroItem.bulk_upsert_from_xero!(items)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                items.size
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error("[XeroItemMappings] get_items error: #{e.response_body}")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                0
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      53.

    app/controllers/admin/xero_items_controller.rb

            require "httparty"

            # app/controllers/admin/xero_items_controller.rb
