            class Admin::XeroItemsController < ApplicationController
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_connection
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_xero_api_client
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              def sync
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                debug = params[:debug].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  tenant_id = @connection.tenant_id
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] Begin sync; tenant=#{tenant_id} expires_at=#{@connection.expires_at}")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ---- Try via SDK first (with pagination) ----
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  items = []
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  sdk_pages = 0
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  sdk_404 = false
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  page = 1
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  loop do
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("Calling API: AccountingApi.get_items page=#{page} ...")
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                      resp = @accounting_api.get_items(tenant_id, { page: page })
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                      if e.code.to_i == 404
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                        sdk_404 = true
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn("[XeroItemsController] SDK get_items returned 404 on page=#{page}; will try HTTP fallback")
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                        break
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                        raise
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    page_items = Array(resp&.items)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    items.concat(page_items)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    sdk_pages += 1
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                    break if page_items.empty? || page_items.length < 100 # Xero default page size is up to 100
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    page += 1
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    break if page > 50 # hard safety cap
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ---- If SDK failed with 404 or returned nothing, try raw HTTP fallback ----
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  if sdk_404 || items.empty?
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] Falling back to raw HTTP for Items ...")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    http_items, http_pages = fetch_items_via_http(@connection.access_token, tenant_id)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    items = http_items if http_items.present?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] HTTP fallback pages=#{http_pages} items=#{items.size}")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] SDK collected pages=#{sdk_pages} items=#{items.size}")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Upsert
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  count = upsert_items(items)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] Upserted #{count} items")
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Messaging
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  if count.zero?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                    message = "Sync finished: no invoice items found."
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path(alert: message)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    message = "Synced #{count} Xero invoice item(s)."
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path(notice: message)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  corr = e.respond_to?(:response_headers) ? e.response_headers&.dig("xero-correlation-id") : nil
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  base = "Sync failed: #{e.message}"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  base << " Corr: #{corr}" if corr.present?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  base << " (Items endpoint returned 404 — possibly missing `accounting.items` scope or Items not enabled)" if e.code.to_i == 404
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  message = base.to_s[0, 300]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("[XeroItemsController] Sync failed ApiError(#{e.class} code=#{e.respond_to?(:code) ? e.code : 'n/a'}): #{message}")
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path(alert: message)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  message = "Sync failed: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("[XeroItemsController] #{message}\n#{e.backtrace&.first(5)&.join("\n")}")
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_xero_connection_path(alert: message.to_s[0, 300])
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

              # Build an AccountingApi client using the saved OAuth access token (same pattern as other Admin controllers)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_xero_api_client
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                XeroRuby.configure { |c| c.access_token = @connection.access_token }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                client = XeroRuby::ApiClient.new
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                client.config.debugging = Rails.env.development?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                @accounting_api = XeroRuby::AccountingApi.new(client)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

              # Fallback: call Items endpoint directly using HTTParty, with pagination.
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_items_via_http(access_token, tenant_id)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                items = []
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                pages = 0
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                page = 1
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                loop do
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  url = "https://api.xero.com/api.xro/2.0/Items?page=#{page}"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  headers = {
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Authorization"   => "Bearer #{access_token}",
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Xero-Tenant-Id"   => tenant_id,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Accept"           => "application/json"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] HTTP GET #{url}")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  resp = HTTParty.get(url, headers: headers)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  corr = resp.headers["xero-correlation-id"] || resp.headers["Xero-Correlation-Id"]
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroItemsController] HTTP status=#{resp.code} corr=#{corr} bytes=#{resp.body&.bytesize}")
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  break if resp.code.to_i == 404 # endpoint not available
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "HTTP #{resp.code} error" unless resp.code.to_i == 200
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  body = JSON.parse(resp.body) rescue {}
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  page_items = Array(body["Items"]).map { |h| normalize_item_hash(h) }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  items.concat(page_items)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  pages += 1
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  break if page_items.empty? || page_items.length < 100
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  page += 1
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  break if page > 50
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                [ items, pages ]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

              def normalize_item_hash(h)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                OpenStruct.new(
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  item_id: h["ItemID"] || h["itemID"],
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  code:    h["Code"]   || h["code"],
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  name:    h["Name"]   || h["name"]
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

              # Upsert items into local table and return count processed.
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              def upsert_items(items)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0 if items.blank?
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                items.each do |item|
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  item_id = item.respond_to?(:item_id) ? item.item_id : (item["ItemID"] || item[:ItemID])
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  code    = item.respond_to?(:code)    ? item.code    : (item["Code"]   || item[:Code])
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  name    = item.respond_to?(:name)    ? item.name    : (item["Name"]   || item[:Name])
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  XeroItem.upsert(
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      xero_item_id: item_id,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      code:         code,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      name:         name,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      created_at:   Time.current,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                      updated_at:   Time.current
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    unique_by: :index_xero_items_on_xero_item_id
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                items.size
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_connection
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                @connection = XeroConnection.first!
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      163.

            require "ostruct"

            class Admin::XeroTimesheetExportsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # before_action :require_admin!
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_xero_api_client, only: [ :new, :create ]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7.

              def index

    8. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to new_admin_xero_timesheet_export_path
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11.

              def new
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                base_date = params[:start_date] ? Date.parse(params[:start_date]) : Time.zone.today
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                @pay_period_start = base_date.beginning_of_week(:wednesday)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                @pay_period_end   = @pay_period_start + 6.days
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                cal_objs = Array(xero_service.payroll_calendars).map do |cal|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  OpenStruct.new(
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                    id:            try_attr(cal, :payroll_calendar_id) || try_attr(cal, "PayrollCalendarID"),
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    start_date:    to_time_or_nil(try_attr(cal, :start_date) || try_attr(cal, "StartDate"))
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @payroll_calendar = cal_objs.find { |c| c.start_date&.to_date == @pay_period_start }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                @user_hours = fetch_user_hours(@pay_period_start, @pay_period_end)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                pay_period_start = Date.parse(params[:pay_period_start])
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                pay_period_end = Date.parse(params[:pay_period_end])
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                idempotency_key = SecureRandom.uuid
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                timesheet_export = TimesheetExport.create!(
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  idempotency_key: idempotency_key,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  pay_period_start: pay_period_start,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  pay_period_end: pay_period_end,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "pending"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                shift_types_by_name = ShiftType.all.index_by { |st| st.name.to_s.downcase }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                timesheets = Timesheet.includes(shift: [ :user, :roster ])
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:approved])
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(clock_in_at: pay_period_start.beginning_of_day..pay_period_end.end_of_day)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where.not(users: { xero_employee_id: nil })
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                number_of_days = (pay_period_end - pay_period_start).to_i + 1
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                aggregated_hours = Hash.new { |h, k| h[k] = Hash.new { |h2, k2| h2[k2] = Array.new(number_of_days, 0.0) } }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                timesheets.each do |ts|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  user = ts.user
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_time = ts.clock_in_at
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  while current_time < ts.clock_out_at
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    rate_name = ts.shift.determine_rate_name_for_time(current_time)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    shift_type = shift_types_by_name[rate_name.to_s.downcase]
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    earnings_rate_id = shift_type&.xero_earnings_rate_id
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    if earnings_rate_id.present?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      day_index = (current_time.to_date - pay_period_start).to_i
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      if day_index >= 0 && day_index < number_of_days
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                        aggregated_hours[user][earnings_rate_id][day_index] += 1 / 60.0
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    current_time += 1.minute
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add travel units (captured at clock-off) into the daily aggregation as a separate earnings rate line
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  if ts.respond_to?(:travel)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                    travel_units = ts.travel.to_f
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    if travel_units.positive?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                      travel_shift_type = shift_types_by_name["travel"]
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                      travel_rate_id = travel_shift_type&.xero_earnings_rate_id
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                      if travel_rate_id.present?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Attribute travel to the clock-out day (when the user enters it)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                        travel_day_index = (ts.clock_out_at.to_date - pay_period_start).to_i
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                        if travel_day_index >= 0 && travel_day_index < number_of_days
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                          aggregated_hours[user][travel_rate_id][travel_day_index] += travel_units
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                total_lines = 0
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                aggregated_hours.each do |user, rates|
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  rates.each do |earnings_rate_id, daily_units|
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_lines += 1
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                    rounded_units = daily_units.map { |hours| hours.round(4) }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    timesheet_export.timesheet_export_lines.create!(
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: user,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                      earnings_rate_id: earnings_rate_id,
          
      91.

                      daily_units: rounded_units
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      95.

                timesheet_export.update!(total_count: total_lines)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.

                users_count = aggregated_hours.keys.size
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100.

                # **THE FIX IS HERE**: The unnecessary calendar ID is removed from the job call.
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                Xero::TimesheetExportJob.perform_later(timesheet_export)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103.

                redirect_to timesheets_path,

      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      106.

    107. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

              def try_attr(obj, key)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                return obj.public_send(key) if obj.respond_to?(key)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                return obj[key]             if obj.is_a?(Hash) && obj.key?(key)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                return obj[key.to_s]        if obj.is_a?(Hash) && obj.key?(key.to_s)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

              def to_time_or_nil(val)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if val.blank?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                return val.to_time if val.respond_to?(:to_time)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                s = val.to_s
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                if (m = s.match(%r{\/Date\((\d+)(?:[+-]\d+)?\)\/}))
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  millis = m[1].to_i
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  return Time.zone.at(millis / 1000)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                Time.zone.parse(s) rescue nil
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126.

              def xero_service

              def fetch_payroll_calendar(tenant_id)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                api = @payroll_api
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  resp = api.get_payroll_calendars(tenant_id)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  return Array(resp&.payroll_calendars) if resp&.payroll_calendars.present?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  if e.code.to_i == 404
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    url = "https://api.xero.com/payroll.xro/1.0/PayrollCalendars"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                    access_token = XeroConnection.first.access_token
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    raw = HTTParty.get(url, headers: { "Authorization" => "Bearer #{access_token}", "Xero-Tenant-Id" => tenant_id, "Accept" => "application/json" })
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    if raw.code.to_i == 200 && raw.body.present?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                      return Array(JSON.parse(raw.body)["PayrollCalendars"]) rescue []
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                []
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_user_hours(pay_period_start, pay_period_end)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                approved_range = pay_period_start.beginning_of_day..pay_period_end.end_of_day
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                User.where.not(xero_employee_id: nil).map do |user|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  scope = user.timesheets.where(status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:approved])
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                                         .where(clock_in_at: approved_range)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_hours = scope.sum { |t| ((t.clock_out_at - t.clock_in_at) / 3600.0) rescue 0.0 }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  travel_km   = scope.sum(:travel).to_f
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  { user: user, total_hours: total_hours, travel_hours: travel_km }
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                end.reject { |data| data[:total_hours].to_f.zero? && data[:travel_hours].to_f.zero? }
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      177.

            class ApplicationController < ActionController::Base
          
      2.

            class LocationsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              def index

            class NotificationsController < ApplicationController

      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @pending = UnavailabilityRequest
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                             .where(status: UnavailabilityRequest::STATUSES[:pending])
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                             .includes(:user)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                             .order(starts_at: :desc)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              def authorize_manager_or_admin!
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                # Assumes `admin?` or `manager?` boolean helpers exist on User
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user&.respond_to?(:admin?) && current_user&.respond_to?(:manager?)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to root_path and return
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                return if current_user.admin? || current_user.manager?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to root_path
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class ReportsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                @locations = Location.all
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @selected_location_id = params[:location_id]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                # Determine the 7-day window (Wednesday to Tuesday)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                anchor_date = params[:week].present? ? Date.parse(params[:week]) : Time.zone.today
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                days_since_wed = (anchor_date.wday - 3) % 7  # 0=Sun, 3=Wed
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                week_start_date = anchor_date - days_since_wed
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                @week_start = week_start_date.beginning_of_day
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                @week_end   = (week_start_date + 6).end_of_day
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                # Useful for the view navigation
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                @current_week_start = week_start_date
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                @prev_week_start    = week_start_date - 7
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                @next_week_start    = week_start_date + 7
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Cap navigation at the current week (do not allow browsing into the future)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                today = Time.zone.today
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                days_since_wed_today = (today.wday - 3) % 7
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @max_week_start = (today - days_since_wed_today)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                if current_user.admin? || current_user.manager?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheets = Timesheet.where.not(notes: [ nil, "" ])
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheets = current_user.timesheets.where.not(notes: [ nil, "" ])
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                # Limit to selected week window (by timesheet clock-in time)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheets = @timesheets.where(clock_in_at: @week_start..@week_end)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheets = @timesheets.includes(shift: [ :location, :user ]).order(clock_in_at: :desc)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                if @selected_location_id.present?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheets = @timesheets.joins(shift: :location).where(locations: { id: @selected_location_id })
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      40.

            class RostersController < ApplicationController

      4.

              # GET /rosters

              def index

              def show

                # @roster, @date, and @selected_location_id are set in set_roster

              end
          
      13.

      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /rosters/week/:date
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              # Creates the roster for the date if it does not exist, then redirects to show
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              def show_by_date
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                date_param = params[:date].to_s
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  date = Date.parse(date_param)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  return redirect_to(rosters_path, alert: "Invalid date provided.")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                roster = Roster.find_by(starts_on: date)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                unless roster
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  roster = Roster.create!(starts_on: date, status: 0)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to roster_path(roster, date: date, location_id: params[:location_id])
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /rosters/:id/copy_previous_week
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

              def copy_previous_week
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks_ago = params[:weeks_ago].to_i
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks_ago = 1 if weeks_ago <= 0
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks_ago = 4 if weeks_ago > 4
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                previous_roster = Roster.find_by(starts_on: @roster.starts_on - weeks_ago.weeks)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                return redirect_to(@roster, alert: "No roster found from #{weeks_ago} week#{'s' if weeks_ago > 1} ago.") unless previous_roster
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                only_location_id = params[:location_id].presence
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                copied = 0
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  scope = previous_roster.shifts.includes(:area, :user, :location)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  scope = scope.where(location_id: only_location_id) if only_location_id
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  scope.find_each do |s|
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup = s.dup
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup.roster_id   = @roster.id
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup.start_time  = s.start_time + weeks_ago.weeks
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup.end_time    = s.end_time   + weeks_ago.weeks
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup.note        = s.note
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup.area_id     = s.area_id
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    dup.location_id = s.location_id

      59.

              end
          
      12.

            end
