      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    locals: { roster: @roster, date: @new_date, selected_location_id: @selected_location_id }
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @old_date != @new_date
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    streams << turbo_stream.replace(
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                      dom_id(@roster, "daily_hours_#{@old_date}"),
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                      partial: "rosters/daily_hours",
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                      locals: { roster: @roster, date: @old_date, selected_location_id: @selected_location_id }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  # If the update came from the modal, close it on success
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless is_drag_and_drop
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    streams << turbo_stream.replace("assign_shift_modal", "")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream { render turbo_stream: streams }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to roster_path(@roster), notice: "Shift updated." }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream do
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                      flash.now[:alert] = @shift.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                      if is_drag_and_drop
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Drag-and-drop failed validation: Revert the shift and show a flash message.
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                        render turbo_stream: [
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace("flash", partial: "layouts/flash"),
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace(dom_id(@roster, "cell_content_#{@old_user.id}_#{@old_date}"),
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                            partial: "rosters/cell_content",
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                            locals: { roster: @roster, user: @old_user, date: @old_date, selected_location_id: @selected_location_id })
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                        ], status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Modal form submission failed validation: Re-render the modal with errors.
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                        render turbo_stream: [
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace("assign_shift_modal",
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                            partial: "shifts/form_modal",
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                            locals: { shift: @shift }),
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                          turbo_stream.replace("flash",
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                            partial: "layouts/flash")
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                        ], status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174.

      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175.

              # DELETE /shifts/1
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                @selected_location_id = params[:roster_filter_location_id]
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = @shift.user
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                @roster = @shift.roster
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                @shift.destroy!
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.turbo_stream
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.html { redirect_to roster_path(@roster), status: :see_other, notice: "Shift deleted." }
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.json { head :no_content }
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /shifts/:id/clock_on
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

              def clock_on
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create or find an open timesheet for this shift
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheet = @shift.timesheets.where(user: current_user, clock_out_at: nil).first_or_initialize
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                if @timesheet.new_record?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheet.user = current_user
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheet.area = @shift.area if @timesheet.respond_to?(:area=)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheet.clock_in_at = Time.current
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build any provided pre-shift answers
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                answers_attrs = params.dig(:timesheet, :shift_answers_attributes)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                if answers_attrs.present?
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                  answers_attrs.each_value do |qa|
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    next if qa[:answer_text].blank?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                    @timesheet.shift_answers.build(
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                      answer_text: qa[:answer_text],
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                      shift_id: @shift.id,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                      timesheet_id: @timesheet.id, # set after save too, but safe here
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                      shift_question_id: qa[:shift_question_id],
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                      user_id: current_user.id
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                # Validate mandatory pre-shift questions are answered when present
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                mandatory_ids = @shift.pre_shift_questions.where(is_mandatory: true).pluck(:id)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                if mandatory_ids.any?
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                  provided_ids = Array(answers_attrs).map { |_, v| v[:shift_question_id].to_i if v[:answer_text].present? }.compact
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  missing_ids = mandatory_ids - provided_ids
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                  if missing_ids.any?
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    flash[:alert] = "Please answer all mandatory pre-shift questions."
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    return redirect_back(fallback_location: shifts_path)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                if @timesheet.save
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Ensure answers have the timesheet id persisted
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @timesheet.shift_answers.any?
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    @timesheet.shift_answers.each { |a| a.timesheet_id ||= @timesheet.id }
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    @timesheet.shift_answers.each(&:save!)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:notice] = "Clocked on. Have a great shift!"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_back(fallback_location: shifts_path)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:alert] = @timesheet.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_back(fallback_location: shifts_path)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_shift
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                @shift = Shift.find(params[:id])
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

              def shift_params
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                params.require(:shift).permit(:user_id, :location_id, :roster_id, :start_time, :end_time, :date, :recurrence_id, :area_id, :roster_filter_location_id, :note)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      251.

    app/controllers/timesheets_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    233 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 233 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            class TimesheetsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_timesheet, only: %i[ show edit update destroy approve clock_off_form clock_off match_roster_times ]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /timesheets
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:date].blank?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to week_timesheets_path(date: Date.today.beginning_of_week(:wednesday).to_s) and return
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                @start_date = Date.parse(params[:date])
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                @selected_location_id = params[:location_id]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                @locations = Location.all
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                week_range = @start_date.beginning_of_day..(@start_date + 6.days).end_of_day
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                published_shifts = Shift.joins(:roster)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(rosters: { status: Roster::STATUSES[:published] })
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(start_time: week_range)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .unscope(:order)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .select("shifts.*")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                unscheduled_shifts = Shift.joins(:roster)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .joins(:timesheets)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .where(rosters: { status: Roster::STATUSES[:draft] })
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .where(start_time: week_range)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .unscope(:order)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .select("shifts.*")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                @shifts = Shift.from("(#{published_shifts.to_sql} UNION #{unscheduled_shifts.to_sql}) AS shifts")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                               .order("shifts.start_time ASC, shifts.end_time ASC, shifts.id ASC")
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                if @selected_location_id.present?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  @shifts = @shifts.where(location_id: @selected_location_id)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                if current_user.admin? || current_user.manager?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  @shifts = @shifts.all
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  @shifts = @shifts.where(user_id: current_user.id)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                # Weekly totals for approved timesheets (hours and travel km)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                approved_scope = Timesheet.where(status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:approved])
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .joins(:shift)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .where(shifts: { start_time: week_range })
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                if @selected_location_id.present?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  approved_scope = approved_scope.where(shifts: { location_id: @selected_location_id })
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user.admin? || current_user.manager?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  approved_scope = approved_scope.where(user_id: current_user.id)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_travel_km = approved_scope.sum(:travel).to_f
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                @total_hours = approved_scope.find_each.inject(0.0) { |sum, ts| sum + ts.duration_in_hours.to_f }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

              def new
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheet = Timesheet.new(user: current_user, clock_in_at: Time.current)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheet.build_shift(user: current_user)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

              def edit
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                starts_on = Date.today.beginning_of_week
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                roster = Roster.find_or_create_by!(starts_on: starts_on, status: Roster::STATUSES[:draft])
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                @shift = Shift.new(shift_params.merge(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  roster: roster,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  user: current_user,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  start_time: Time.current,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  end_time: Time.current + 8.hours
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                ))
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheet = @shift.timesheets.build(
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  user: current_user,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  clock_in_at: Time.current,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:pending]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                if @shift.save
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to dashboards_path
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheet = @shift.timesheets.first || @shift.timesheets.build
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

              def update
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                updated_params = timesheet_params
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                shift_date = @timesheet.shift.start_time.to_date
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:timesheet][:clock_in_at].present?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  clock_in_time = Time.zone.parse(params[:timesheet][:clock_in_at])
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  updated_params[:clock_in_at] = clock_in_time.change(year: shift_date.year, month: shift_date.month, day: shift_date.day)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:timesheet][:clock_out_at].present?
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  clock_out_time = Time.zone.parse(params[:timesheet][:clock_out_at])
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  updated_params[:clock_out_at] = clock_out_time.change(year: shift_date.year, month: shift_date.month, day: shift_date.day)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                if @timesheet.update(updated_params)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to timesheets_path, status: :see_other
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheet.destroy!
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to timesheets_url, notice: "Timesheet was successfully destroyed.", status: :see_other
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

              def clock_on
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                @shift = Shift.find(params[:id])
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                if @shift.timesheets.where(user: current_user, clock_out_at: nil).none?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheet = @shift.timesheets.create(
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: current_user,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    clock_in_at: Time.current,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:pending]
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to dashboards_path
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to dashboards_path, alert: "You are already clocked on for this shift."
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

              def clock_off_form
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              def clock_off
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                if @timesheet.update(clock_off_params)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Notify only if a Post Shift (Yes/No) answer was submitted
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @timesheet.shift_answers
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                                .joins(:shift_question)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where(shift_questions: { question_type: ShiftQuestion::QUESTION_TYPES[:POST_SHIFT_YN] })
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where.not(answer_text: [ nil, "" ])
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                                .exists?
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    TimesheetMailer.with(timesheet: @timesheet).shift_feedback.deliver_later
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to dashboards_path
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :clock_off_form, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

              def approve
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                if @timesheet.update(status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:approved])
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to timesheets_path }
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to timesheets_path, alert: "Could not approve timesheet."
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              def match_roster_times
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                if @timesheet.update(clock_in_at: @timesheet.shift.start_time, clock_out_at: @timesheet.shift.end_time)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.html { redirect_to week_timesheets_path(date: @timesheet.shift.start_time.to_date.beginning_of_week(:wednesday)) }
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to week_timesheets_path(date: @timesheet.shift.start_time.to_date.beginning_of_week(:wednesday)), alert: "Could not update timesheet."
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

              def new_unscheduled
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                @users = User.where.not(role: nil).order(:name)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                @locations = Location.order(:name)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                @areas = Area.all.to_json(only: [ :id, :name, :location_id ])
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                @start_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                @timesheet = Timesheet.new(
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  clock_in_at: @start_date.to_time.change(hour: 9),
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  clock_out_at: @start_date.to_time.change(hour: 17)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

              def create_unscheduled
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                ts_params = params.require(:timesheet).permit(:user_id, :location_id, :date, :clock_in_at, :clock_out_at, :area_id)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                user = User.find(ts_params[:user_id])
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                location = Location.find(ts_params[:location_id])
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                area = Area.find(ts_params[:area_id]) if ts_params[:area_id].present?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                start_time = Time.zone.parse("#{ts_params[:date]} #{ts_params[:clock_in_at]}")
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                end_time = Time.zone.parse("#{ts_params[:date]} #{ts_params[:clock_out_at]}")
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                roster = Roster.find_or_create_by!(starts_on: start_time.to_date.beginning_of_week(:wednesday), status: Roster::STATUSES[:draft])
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                shift = Shift.new(
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  user: user,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  location: location,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  area: area,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  roster: roster,
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  start_time: start_time,
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  end_time: end_time,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                  bypass_unavailability_validation: true
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                if shift.save
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  timesheet = Timesheet.create!(
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    shift: shift,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                    user_id: user.id,
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    clock_in_at: start_time,
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    clock_out_at: end_time,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: Timesheet::STATUSES[:pending]
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to week_timesheets_path(date: start_time.to_date), notice: "Unscheduled timesheet created successfully."
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                  @users = User.where.not(role: nil).order(:name)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                  @locations = Location.order(:name)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                  @areas = Area.all.to_json(only: [ :id, :name, :location_id ])
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  @start_date = start_time.to_date
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                  @timesheet = Timesheet.new(clock_in_at: start_time, clock_out_at: end_time)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash.now[:alert] = shift.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :new_unscheduled, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

              def open_for_shift
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                shift = Shift.find(params[:shift_id])
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                # If an admin/manager is navigating from the weekly view, create the timesheet for the rostered user.
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                # Otherwise, for regular staff, create it for the current user (like pressing Clock On).
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                target_user = (current_user.admin? || current_user.manager?) ? shift.user : current_user
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                timesheet = shift.timesheets.where(user: target_user, clock_out_at: nil).first_or_initialize
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                if timesheet.new_record?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                  timesheet.clock_in_at = shift.start_time
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                  timesheet.status = Timesheet::STATUSES[:pending]
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                  timesheet.save!
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to edit_timesheet_path(timesheet)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to week_timesheets_path(date: Date.today.beginning_of_week(:wednesday)), alert: "Shift not found."
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      246.

              def create

              def set_unavailability_request

                @unavailability_request = UnavailabilityRequest.find(params[:id])

              end
          
      83.

              def unavailability_request_params
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                params.require(:unavailability_request).permit(:reason, :starts_at, :ends_at, :starts_at_time, :ends_at_time, :all_day, :repeats_weekly)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      87.

      88.

              def processed_unavailability_params
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                attrs = unavailability_request_params.to_h
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                start_date_str = attrs[:starts_at]
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                end_date_str   = attrs[:ends_at].presence || start_date_str
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                start_time_str = attrs[:starts_at_time]
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                end_time_str   = attrs[:ends_at_time].presence || start_time_str
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                if attrs[:all_day] == "true"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  # All day: use full-day bounds. Require a start date; end date defaults to start date.
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  if start_date_str.present?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:starts_at] = Time.zone.parse(start_date_str).beginning_of_day
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    if end_date_str.present?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs[:ends_at] = Time.zone.parse(end_date_str).end_of_day
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Timed: compose from date + time. End date defaults to start date; end time defaults to start time.
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  if start_date_str.present? && start_time_str.present?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:starts_at] = Time.zone.parse("#{start_date_str} #{start_time_str}")
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  if end_date_str.present? && end_time_str.present?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:ends_at] = Time.zone.parse("#{end_date_str} #{end_time_str}")
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                attrs.except(:starts_at_time, :ends_at_time, :all_day)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            end
