            class Users::RegistrationsController < Devise::RegistrationsController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              skip_before_action :authenticate_user!, only: [ :edit, :update ]
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              skip_before_action :authenticate_scope!, only: [ :edit, :update ]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # This action is triggered by the link in the invitation email.
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # It finds the user by the token and shows the form to set a password.
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def edit
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @token = params[:invitation_token]
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @user  = User.find_by(invitation_token: @token)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.blank? || @user.invitation_sent_at.blank? || @user.invitation_sent_at < 72.hours.ago
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_user_session_path, alert: "Your invitation token is invalid or has expired."
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                # Don't call super; this path is for users who aren't signed in yet.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                self.resource = @user
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                render :edit
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              # This action is triggered when the new employee submits the form.
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              def update
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = User.find_by(invitation_token: user_params[:invitation_token])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.nil?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_user_session_path, alert: "Your invitation token is invalid or has expired." and return
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.update(user_params)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Invalidate the token after use
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user.update(invitation_token: nil, invitation_sent_at: nil)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  sign_in(@user)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to user_path(@user), notice: "Your account has been successfully set up!"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.resource = @user
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              # Strong params for invitation/edit registration
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

              def user_params
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fields a user can safely set for themselves during invitation acceptance / self-edit
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                safe = [
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  :name, :email, :phone, :gender,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  :obtained_screening, :date_of_birth, :address, :suburb, :state,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  :postcode, :emergency_name, :emergency_phone, :disability_experience,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  :other_experience, :other_employment, :licence, :availability, :bio,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  :known_client, :resident, :education, :qualification, :bank_account,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  :bsb, :tfn, :training, :departure, :yellow_expiry, :blue_expiry,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  :tfn_threshold, :debt, :super_name, :super_number
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                # Always allow password fields + invitation token in this flow
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                base = safe + [ :password, :password_confirmation, :invitation_token ]
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                # Only admins can set privileged attributes (rare in this flow, but safe to gate)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                if current_user && (current_user.respond_to?(:admin?) ? current_user.admin? : current_user.role == "admin")
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  base += [ :role, :status, { location_ids: [] } ]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                params.require(:user).permit(base)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      65.

            class UsersController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_user, only: %i[ show edit update destroy employ contact archive restore ]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /users
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                case params[:filter]
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                when "applicants"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  @users = User.applicants
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                when "contacted"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  @users = User.contacted
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                when "ended"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Show users whose status is ended OR who are archived
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  @users = User.with_archived.where("status = :ended OR archived_at IS NOT NULL", ended: User::STATUSES[:ended])
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Now correctly fetches all users with a role.
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  @users = User.where.not(role: nil)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      20.

      21.

              # GET /users/1
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              def show
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                @upcoming_shifts = @user.shifts.joins(:roster)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .where(rosters: { status: Roster::STATUSES[:published] })
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .where("shifts.start_time >= ?", Time.current)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .order(:start_time)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                                          .limit(5)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                @unavailability_requests = @user.unavailability_requests.where(status: 1).order(:starts_at)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31.

              # POST /users

              def create
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = User.new(user_params)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                # New users created by an admin are employees by default.
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                @user.role ||= User::ROLES[:employee]
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.save
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @user, notice: "User was successfully created."
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

            # PATCH/PUT /users/1

            def update
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              # Create a mutable copy of the parameters
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              updated_params = user_params.to_h
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              # Clean up the location_ids array to remove the blank value
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

              if updated_params[:location_ids]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                updated_params[:location_ids].reject!(&:blank?)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              # Remove password params if they are blank, so we don't validate them
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              if updated_params[:password].blank?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                updated_params.delete(:password)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                updated_params.delete(:password_confirmation)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

              if @user.update(updated_params)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to @user, notice: "User was successfully updated."
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              else
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                # This will print the validation errors to your terminal
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                p @user.errors.full_messages
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

              # DELETE /users/1

              def destroy
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                @user.destroy!
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to users_url, notice: "User was successfully destroyed.", status: :see_other
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

              # PATCH /users/:id/archive
          
      85.

              def archive
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user&.admin? || current_user&.manager?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @user, alert: "Unauthorized" and return
          
      88.

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                @user.update(archived_at: Time.current)

              # PATCH /users/:id/restore
          
      95.

              def restore
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user&.admin? || current_user&.manager?
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @user, alert: "Unauthorized" and return
          
      98.

                end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99.

                @user.update(archived_at: nil)

      102.

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /users/:id/employ
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              def employ
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.status == User::STATUSES[:applicant]
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user.invitation_token = SecureRandom.urlsafe_base64
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user.invitation_sent_at = Time.current
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user.role = User::ROLES[:employee] # Assign the employee role
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user.status = nil # Clear the applicant status
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user.save!
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  UserMailer.with(user: @user).invitation_email.deliver_later
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @user, notice: "Employment email sent to #{@user.name}."
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @user, alert: "This user has already been processed."
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /users/:id/contact
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

              def contact
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                # Only admins may change status
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                unless current_user && (current_user.respond_to?(:admin?) ? current_user.admin? : current_user&.role == "admin")
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @user, alert: "Unauthorized" and return
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                # Update status to contacted without relying on mass-assignment
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                target_value = if defined?(User::STATUSES) && User::STATUSES.is_a?(Hash) && User::STATUSES[:contacted]
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                                 User::STATUSES[:contacted]
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                                 "contacted"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.update(status: target_value)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to(params[:redirect_to].presence || users_path(filter: "applicants"), notice: "User marked as contacted.")
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to(params[:redirect_to].presence || users_path(filter: "applicants"), alert: @user.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use callbacks to share common setup or constraints between actions.
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                def set_user
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use with_archived so archive/restore and show can target archived users
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  @user = User.with_archived.find(params[:id])
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                end

              def all_day_range?(starts_at, ends_at)

    5.

              def time_options_for_select

            class AutoClockOutJob < ApplicationJob

              def perform

                # Find timesheets that are still clocked in and where the shift's

                FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_ENV = "XERO_FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_CODE".freeze
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                AUTO_CREATE_CONTACTS_ENV = "XERO_AUTO_CREATE_CONTACTS".freeze
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                AUTO_CREATE_ITEMS_ENV = "XERO_AUTO_CREATE_ITEMS".freeze
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                def short(id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  id.to_s.split("-").first
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                private :short
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                def perform(invoice_export)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  connection = XeroConnection.first
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless connection
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] No XeroConnection record found; aborting job.")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                    invoice_export.update(status: "failed", error_blob: "No Xero connection configured")
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  if connection.expires_at.nil? || connection.expires_at <= Time.current + 5.minutes
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Access token near/after expiry (expires_at=#{connection.expires_at&.iso8601 || 'nil'}) — attempting refresh…")
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                    refreshed = refresh_token(connection)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless refreshed
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                      invoice_export.update(status: "failed", error_blob: "Failed to refresh Xero token")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  xero_tenant_id = connection.tenant_id
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  if xero_tenant_id.blank?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Missing tenant_id on XeroConnection; aborting.")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    invoice_export.update(status: "failed", error_blob: "Missing Xero tenant id")
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  XeroRuby.configure { |c| c.access_token = connection.access_token }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  api_client = XeroRuby::ApiClient.new
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  accounting_api = XeroRuby::AccountingApi.new(api_client)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  fallback_account_code = resolve_fallback_account_code(accounting_api, xero_tenant_id, connection)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  invoice_export.update(status: "processing")
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  exported_count = 0
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Using tenant_id=#{xero_tenant_id} token_expires_at=#{connection.expires_at&.iso8601}")
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Fallback account code resolved to: #{fallback_account_code.presence || '(none)'}")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  lines_by_location = invoice_export.invoice_export_lines.includes(:location, :area, :timesheet).group_by(&:location)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Grouped lines by location: #{lines_by_location.transform_values { |arr| arr.size }}")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  lines_by_location.each do |location, lines|
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      contact_hash = ensure_contact_hash(accounting_api, xero_tenant_id, location.name)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Using contact #{contact_hash[:contact_id] ? 'ContactID' : 'Name'} for location='#{location&.name}'")
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Building payload for location='#{location&.name}' lines=#{lines.size}")
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      # === BEGIN travel supplement (create extra Travel line-items for timesheets with travel > 0) ===
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Collect timesheets in this location batch
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                        timesheets_in_batch = lines.map(&:timesheet).compact.uniq
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                        travel_timesheets    = timesheets_in_batch.select { |ts| ts.travel.to_d > 0 }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Skip building duplicates when a line is already a Travel-area line for that timesheet
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                        travel_line_ts_ids_already_present =
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                          lines.select { |l| l.area&.name&.casecmp?("travel") }.map { |l| l.timesheet&.id }.compact.uniq
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                        travel_timesheets.reject! { |ts| travel_line_ts_ids_already_present.include?(ts.id) }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Find the Travel area for this location (case-insensitive)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                        travel_area =
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                          begin
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                            Area.where(location_id: location&.id).find { |a| a.name.to_s.strip.casecmp?("travel") }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                          rescue => e
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                            Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Could not query Travel area for location='#{location&.name}': #{e.class}: #{e.message}")
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                            nil
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                          end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                        @travel_item_line_items_extra = []
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                        @travel_account_line_items_extra = []
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                        if travel_timesheets.any?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                          if travel_area.nil?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                            Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Travel timesheets present but no 'Travel' area found for location='#{location&.name}'. Skipping extra travel lines.")
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                          else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                            mapped_travel_code =
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                              if travel_area.respond_to?(:xero_item_code) && travel_area.xero_item_code.present?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                                travel_area.xero_item_code
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                                travel_area.export_code
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                            travel_timesheets.each do |ts|
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                              # Date string: "16 AUG 2025"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                              date_str =
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                                begin
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                                  (ts.clock_in_at || Time.current).in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date.strftime("%-d %^b %Y")
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                                rescue
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                                  Time.current.in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date.strftime("%-d %^b %Y")
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                              desc = "Activity based transport #{date_str}"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                              qty = ts.travel.to_d
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                              if qty <= 0
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                                Rails.logger.debug("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Skipping zero/negative travel for timesheet_id=#{ts.id}")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                                next
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                              # ItemCode mode: DO NOT set unit_amount so Xero uses the Item's default price
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                              @travel_item_line_items_extra << {
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                                item_code: mapped_travel_code,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                                description: desc,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                                quantity: qty,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                                tax_type: "NONE"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                                # no :unit_amount on purpose
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                              }
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                              # Fallback account mode (only used when ItemCode fails). Keep amount 0.0 and log.
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                              @travel_account_line_items_extra << {
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                                description: desc,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                                quantity: qty,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                                unit_amount: 0.0,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                                tax_type: "NONE",
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                                account_code: fallback_account_code.presence
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                              }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                              Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Added extra Travel line for timesheet_id=#{ts.id} location='#{location&.name}' qty=#{qty}")
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                            end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                          end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue => e
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Travel supplement build error for location='#{location&.name}': #{e.class}: #{e.message}")
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                      # === END travel supplement ===
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      item_line_items = lines.map do |line|
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                        mapped_code = if line.area.respond_to?(:xero_item_code) && line.area.xero_item_code.present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                          line.area.xero_item_code
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                          line.area.export_code
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                        line_item = {
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                          item_code: mapped_code,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                          description: line.description,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                          tax_type: "NONE"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                        if line.area&.name&.downcase == "travel"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                          # For Travel from a Travel-area line: quantity is travel hours, description fixed, no unit_amount.
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                          ts = line.timesheet
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                          date_str =
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                            begin
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                              (ts.clock_in_at || Time.current).in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date.strftime("%-d %^b %Y")
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                            rescue
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                              Time.current.in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date.strftime("%-d %^b %Y")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                            end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:description] = "Activity based transport #{date_str}"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:quantity]    = ts.travel.to_d
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                          # IMPORTANT: do NOT set :unit_amount so Xero pulls price from Item Code
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                          # Hours worked: keep existing behaviour (quantity = hours; no unit_amount here).
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:quantity] = line.timesheet.duration_in_hours
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                        line_item
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Append the extra Travel line-items built from timesheets that had travel > 0 but no Travel line yet:
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                      if defined?(@travel_item_line_items_extra) && @travel_item_line_items_extra.present?
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Appending #{@travel_item_line_items_extra.size} extra Travel item-code lines for location='#{location&.name}'")
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                        item_line_items.concat(@travel_item_line_items_extra)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                      account_line_items = lines.map do |line|
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                        line_item = {
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                          description: line.description,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                          tax_type: "NONE"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                        if line.area&.name&.downcase == "travel"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                          ts = line.timesheet
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                          date_str =
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                            begin
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                              (ts.clock_in_at || Time.current).in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date.strftime("%-d %^b %Y")
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                            rescue
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                              Time.current.in_time_zone("Australia/Brisbane").to_date.strftime("%-d %^b %Y")
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                            end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:description] = "Activity based transport #{date_str}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:quantity]    = ts.travel.to_d
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:unit_amount] = 0.0  # In fallback account mode we cannot rely on Item pricing
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:quantity]    = line.timesheet.duration_in_hours
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                          line_item[:unit_amount] = 0.0  # keep your existing fallback behaviour
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                        line_item[:account_code] = fallback_account_code if fallback_account_code.present?
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                        line_item
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Append the extra Travel fallback lines too (only used when we switch to account mode)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                      if defined?(@travel_account_line_items_extra) && @travel_account_line_items_extra.present?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Appending #{@travel_account_line_items_extra.size} extra Travel account-mode lines for location='#{location&.name}'")
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                        account_line_items.concat(@travel_account_line_items_extra)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] No fallback account code available after auto-detect; set #{FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_ENV} or add a revenue account in Xero if you want account-mode retry.") if fallback_account_code.blank?
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                      if item_line_items.any? { |li| li[:item_code].blank? || li[:quantity].nil? }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] One or more line items missing item_code or quantity for location='#{location&.name}'. Will try fallback account_code if configured.")
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] item_line_items preview: #{item_line_items.take(3).inspect}#{item_line_items.size > 3 ? '…' : ''}")
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] account_line_items preview: #{account_line_items.take(3).inspect}#{account_line_items.size > 3 ? '…' : ''}")
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      build_payload = ->(li) do
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                        {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                          invoices: [ {
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                            type: "ACCREC",
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                            contact: contact_hash,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                            date: Time.current.to_date,
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                            due_date: Time.current.to_date + 7.days,
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                            line_items: li,
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                            status: "DRAFT"
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                          } ]
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                      opts = { summarize_errors: false, unitdp: 4 }
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234.
