    632. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] HTTP create Item code=#{code.inspect} status=#{resp.code} corr=#{corr} short_corr=#{short(corr)} bytes=#{resp.body.to_s.bytesize}")
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            

            
              
            

                  if resp.code.to_i >= 400
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] HTTP create Item failed for code=#{code.inspect}: status=#{resp.code} body=#{resp.body}")
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] HTTP create Item exception for code=#{code.inspect}: #{e.class}: #{e.message}")
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            

            
              
            

                private :create_item_http
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            

            
              
            

                private :http_create_invoice
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            

            
              
            

                private
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            

            
              
            

                def refresh_token(connection)
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            

            
              
            

                  client_id     = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:xero, :client_id)
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            

            
              
            

                  client_secret = Rails.application.credentials.dig(:xero, :client_secret)
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            

            
              
            

                  if client_id.blank? || client_secret.blank?
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Missing Xero client credentials; cannot refresh token.")
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            

            
              
            

                    return false
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Refreshing access token… expires_at was #{connection.expires_at&.iso8601}")
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = HTTParty.post(
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            

            
              
            

                    "https://identity.xero.com/connect/token",
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            

            
              
            

                    headers: { "Content-Type" => "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            

            
              
            

                    body:    { grant_type: "refresh_token", refresh_token: connection.refresh_token },
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            

            
              
            

                    basic_auth: { username: client_id, password: client_secret }
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            

            
              
            

                  if response.success?
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            

            
              
            

                    data = response.parsed_response
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            

            
              
            

                    connection.update!(
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            

            
              
            

                      access_token:  data["access_token"],
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            

            
              
            

                      refresh_token: data["refresh_token"],
          
      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            

            
              
            

                      expires_at:    Time.current + data["expires_in"].to_i.seconds
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            

            
              
            

                    corr = response.headers["xero-correlation-id"] rescue nil
          
      669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    669. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Token refresh successful; new expires_at=#{connection.expires_at&.iso8601} corr=#{corr} short_corr=#{short(corr)}")
          
      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            

            
              
            

                    true
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            

            
              
            

                    status = response.code rescue nil
          
      673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    673. 
            

            
              
            

                    corr   = response.headers["xero-correlation-id"] rescue nil
          
      674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    674. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Token refresh FAILED status=#{status} corr=#{corr} short_corr=#{short(corr)} body=#{response.body}")
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            

            
              
            

                    false
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            

            
              
            

                def resolve_fallback_account_code(accounting_api, tenant_id, connection)
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            

            
              
            

                  if connection.respond_to?(:sales_account_code) && connection.sales_account_code.present?
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Using connection.sales_account_code=#{connection.sales_account_code}")
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            

            
              
            

                    return connection.sales_account_code.to_s
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            

            
              
            

                  if ENV[FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_ENV].present?
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Using ENV #{FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_ENV}=#{ENV[FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_ENV]}")
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            

            
              
            

                    return ENV[FALLBACK_ACCOUNT_ENV].to_s
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] Auto-detecting fallback account code via Accounts API…")
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            
              
            

                  accounts = []
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            
              
            

                    resp = accounting_api.get_accounts(tenant_id)
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            
              
            

                    accounts = Array(resp&.accounts)
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            
              
            

                    corr = (e.response_headers || {})["xero-correlation-id"] rescue nil
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            
              
            

                    status = e.respond_to?(:code) ? e.code : nil
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] SDK get_accounts ApiError status=#{status} corr=#{corr} short_corr=#{short(corr)} body=#{e.response_body.to_s.presence || '(empty)'}; trying HTTP fallback")
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            
              
            

                  if accounts.blank?
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            
              
            

                      accounts = fetch_accounts_http(tenant_id)
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.warn("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] HTTP fallback get Accounts failed: #{e.class}: #{e.message}")
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            
              
            

                  chosen = nil
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            
              
            

                  if accounts.present?
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            
              
            

                    normalized = accounts.map do |a|
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            
              
            

                      if a.respond_to?(:code)
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            
              
            

                        { code: a.code.to_s, name: a.respond_to?(:name) ? a.name.to_s : (a["Name"] || a[:Name]).to_s, type: (a.respond_to?(:type) ? a.type.to_s : (a["Type"] || a[:Type]).to_s) }
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            
              
            

                        { code: (a["Code"] || a[:Code]).to_s, name: (a["Name"] || a[:Name]).to_s, type: (a["Type"] || a[:Type]).to_s }
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            
              
            

                    chosen = normalized.find { |a| a[:code] == "200" && a[:type].casecmp?("REVENUE") }&.dig(:code)
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            
              
            

                    chosen ||= normalized.find { |a| a[:type].casecmp?("REVENUE") }&.dig(:code)
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            
              
            

                    chosen ||= normalized.find { |a| a[:code] == "200" }&.dig(:code)
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            
              
            

                    chosen ||= normalized.find { |a| a[:name].to_s.downcase.include?("sales") }&.dig(:code)
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724.

                  if chosen.present?

                private :resolve_fallback_account_code

                def fetch_accounts_http(tenant_id)
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            

            
              
            

                  token = XeroConnection.first&.access_token
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "missing access_token" if token.blank?
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            

            
              
            

                  url = "https://api.xero.com/api.xro/2.0/Accounts"
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] HTTP GET #{url}")
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            

            
              
            

                  resp = HTTParty.get(url, headers: {
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Authorization" => "Bearer #{token}",
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Xero-Tenant-Id" => tenant_id,
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Accept" => "application/json"
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            

            
              
            

                  })
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            

            
              
            

                  corr = resp.headers["xero-correlation-id"] rescue nil
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[Xero::InvoiceExportJob] HTTP Accounts status=#{resp.code} corr=#{corr} short_corr=#{short(corr)} bytes=#{resp.body.to_s.bytesize}")
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            

            
              
            

                  if resp.code.to_i == 200
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            

            
              
            

                    body = JSON.parse(resp.body) rescue {}
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            

            
              
            

                    Array(body["Accounts"])
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            

            
              
            

                    []
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      755. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    755. 
            

            
              
            

                private :fetch_accounts_http
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      757. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    757. 
            

            
              
            

            end

                def perform(timesheet_export)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  connection = XeroConnection.first
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  if connection.expires_at <= Time.current + 5.minutes
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                    refresh_token(connection)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  xero_tenant_id = connection.tenant_id
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  access_token = connection.access_token
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  timesheet_export.update(status: "processing")
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  exported_count = 0

    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  timesheet_export.timesheet_export_lines.group_by(&:user).each do |user, lines|
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    timesheet_payload = {
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                      "EmployeeID" => user.xero_employee_id,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                      "StartDate" => timesheet_export.pay_period_start.to_date.iso8601,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                      "EndDate" => timesheet_export.pay_period_end.to_date.iso8601,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                      "Status" => "DRAFT",

    24. 
            

            
              
            

                      "TimesheetLines" => lines.map do |line|

      26.

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                      response = HTTParty.post(
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                        "https://api.xero.com/payroll.xro/1.0/Timesheets",
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                        headers: {
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36.

                          "Accept"         => "application/json",
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                          # **THE FIX IS HERE**: The idempotency key is now correctly sent as a header.

      43.

    44. 
            

            
              
            

                        body: [ timesheet_payload ].to_json
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                      if response.success?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48.

      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                        if created_xero_timesheet
          
      50.

      52.

      59.

                        status: "failed",
          
      60.

                        error_blob: "Error for user #{user.name}: #{e.message}"
          
      61.

      64.

                def refresh_token(connection)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  client_id     = Rails.application.credentials.xero[:client_id]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  client_secret = Rails.application.credentials.xero[:client_secret]
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = HTTParty.post(
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    "https://identity.xero.com/connect/token",
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                    headers: { "Content-Type" => "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    body:    { grant_type: "refresh_token", refresh_token: connection.refresh_token },
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    basic_auth: { username: client_id, password: client_secret }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  if response.success?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    data = response.parsed_response
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    connection.update!(
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                      access_token:  data["access_token"],
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                      refresh_token: data["refresh_token"],
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                      expires_at:    Time.current + data["expires_in"].to_i.seconds
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise "Failed to refresh Xero token!"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            class AgreementMailer < ApplicationMailer
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def signed
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = params[:user]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                @agreement = params[:agreement]

                @acceptance = params[:acceptance]

                pdf_data = params[:pdf_data]

                  mime_type: "application/pdf",

              def duration_in_hours

              def determine_rate_name_for_time(time)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                date = time.to_date
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check for Public Holiday first, as it has the highest precedence.
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                if roster.public_holiday?(date)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  return "Public Holiday"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                case time.wday
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                when 6 # Saturday
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Saturday"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                when 0 # Sunday
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Sunday"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                else # Weekday
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  hour = time.hour
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  if hour >= 22 # 10 PM or later
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Weeknight (after 2 hours)"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  elsif hour >= 20 # 8 PM to 9:59 PM
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Weeknight (first 2 hours)"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48.

      49.

              def duration_within_limits

      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                                    "loc=#{location_id} area: #{area_id_before_last_save.inspect}→#{area_id.inspect} " \

                                    "note: #{note_before_last_save.inspect}→#{note.inspect}")

              def self.for_area(area)

              def duration_in_hours

              def clock_out_after_clock_in

    80. 
            

            
              
            

                if clock_out_at <= clock_in_at
          
      81.

                  errors.add(:clock_out_at, "must be after the clock in time")

              # FIX: Add this method to define what an "all day" request is.

              # It returns true if the start/end times span the entire day.
          
      34.

              # Upsert a single item payload from Xero
          
      7.

              def self.upsert_from_xero!(x_item)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                attrs = {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  code:         x_item.code,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  name:         x_item.name,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  xero_item_id: (x_item.try(:item_id) || x_item.try(:id))
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                }.compact
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                rec = find_or_initialize_by(code: attrs[:code])
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                rec.assign_attributes(attrs)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

      17.

                rec
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

      19.

              # Bulk upsert from an array of Xero SDK items
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.bulk_upsert_from_xero!(items)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                Array(items).each { |xi| upsert_from_xero!(xi) }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25.

              def self.sync_from_xero!(connection)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                api_client     = XeroRuby::ApiClient.new
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                accounting_api = XeroRuby::AccountingApi.new(api_client)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                # connection.access_token is expected to be the raw OAuth2 access token string
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                api_client.set_oauth2_token(connection.access_token)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                total = 0
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                page  = 1
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                loop do
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info("[XeroItem] Fetching items page=#{page} ...")
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  resp   = accounting_api.get_items(connection.tenant_id, page: page)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  items  = Array(resp.items)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  break if items.empty?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  bulk_upsert_from_xero!(items)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  total += items.size
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  page  += 1
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                total
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue XeroRuby::ApiError => e
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                corr = (e.response_headers && e.response_headers["xero-correlation-id"])
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error("[XeroItem] sync_from_xero! ApiError status=#{e.code} corr=#{corr} body=#{e.response_body.presence || '(empty)'}")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                raise
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class AgreementPdf

              def self.render(agreement, acceptance, extra: {})
          
      3.

                require "prawn"
          
      4.

                begin
